settings.heading: Catalyst Pet Dealer Direct Portal
settings.copy: Your gateway to order Catalyst products at dealer prices, sales information, valuable resources and more for Catalyst Pet Litter.

settings.heading: Dealer program information
settings.copy: Shipped right to your store! Buy direct in quantities of 40 pounds, either 10-pound bags or two 20-pound bags.

settings.heading: Dealer Benefits
settings.copy: Featuring in-store dealer specific pricing, ordering Catalyst is quick and easy. We'll begin processing your order immediately so you and your customers won't have to wait.

settings.heading: 4x more efficient = save more per use!
settings.copy: Not only is Catalyst litter 4 times more absorbent than other leading litter brands, it's also 37% cheaper, controls odor better, is lighter to carry, and doesn't have the nasty clay airborne dust that is typical of other brands. Give it a try!

settings.heading: Hear from Real Catalyst Users
settings.copy: Don't just take our word for it! Check out @Catalystpet on Facebook, Instagram and TikTok for detailed testimonials and reviews from some cool cats. You might recognize a few ðŸ˜¸
